description: The specific month and year for the reported sales data, e.g., February 2024.
The monetary amount spent in retail sales during the specified period.
The quantity of goods sold in retail stores during the specified period.
The specific category of retail, such as non-food stores, food stores, and automotive fuel.
The percentage change in sales values or volumes compared to the previous month.
The percentage change in sales values or volumes compared to the same month in the previous year.
The monetary amount spent on online retail purchases during the specified period.
The percentage of total sales that were made online during the specified period.
The weather conditions reported for the specified period, which may affect retail footfall and sales.
Information on changes in automotive fuel prices affecting sales volumes.
